/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a spectrum of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered along the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below.
